title: Any vintage car rentals in area?
text:
Hello, I’m planning ahead for my boyfriends birthday in the summer and wanted to rent a vintage car for the day. Something like a
1985 Mercedes-Benz 380-Class 380SL 2-Door Convertible or a car with a similar aesthetic will do. 

I saw some options on Turo in the area but unfortunately they only rent to 30+ year olds and I’m 26.

Anyone know of any other options in Seattle area I could look into? 

Of course this is also contingent on whether or not quarantine is still in place by the end of summer.

Thank you :)
